segments.text: He always likes to say something as if all his geese are swans .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know this characteristic of him . So I never think seriously of his words .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . This is a clever way to be in contact with such a person .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It seems that you don't like him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You like to communicate with him ?
segments.speaker: S1
